itunes:title: MAR 25 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 30 UPDATE
title: MAR 25 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 30 UPDATE
description:
After more than 30 hours of hearings, the Senate is on track to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson. Posobiec provides a recap on this week's hearings. According to the French Ministry of the Army, pressure on urban centers in eastern and southern Ukraine are mounting, specifically in Mariupol. All of this as President Biden reminds the nation that global food shortages are ‘gonna be real’; and foreign fighters traveling to Ukraine share their location with the world and the enemy via social media. 

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO


To get 15% off your first order of Field of Greens go to http://www.brickhouseposo.com and use code POSO


To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO
content:encoded:
After more than 30 hours of hearings, the Senate is on track to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson. Posobiec provides a recap on this week's hearings. According to the French Ministry of the Army, pressure on urban centers in eastern and southern Ukraine are mounting, specifically in Mariupol. All of this as President Biden reminds the nation that global food shortages are ‘gonna be real’; and foreign fighters traveling to Ukraine share their location with the world and the enemy via social media.
